00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT2
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT2
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 #include <assert.h>
00026 #include <cmath>
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00029 
00030 using std::sqrt;
00031 using std::cos;
00032 using std::sin;
00033 
00043 template <typename Numeric>
00044 struct Point2 {
00045 
00046     Numeric x, y;
00047 
00048     Point2() : x(0), y(0) { }
00049     Point2(Numeric x, Numeric y) : x(x), y(y) { }
00050     Point2(const Point2<Numeric>& p) : x(p.x), y(p.y) { }
00051 
00053 
00054     Point2  operator- (const Point2&  p) const { return Point2(x - p.x, y - p.y); }
00055 
00057     Point2  operator+ (const Point2&  p) const { return Point2(x + p.x, y + p.y); }
00058 
00060     Point2&  operator-= (const Point2&  p) { x -= p.x; y -= p.y; return *this; }
00061 
00063     Point2&  operator+= (const Point2&  p) { x += p.x; y += p.y; return *this; }
00064 
00066     Point2  operator* (const Numeric& n) const { return Point2(  x * n,   y * n); }
00067 
00069     Point2  operator/ (const Numeric& n) const { return Point2(  x / n,   y / n); }
00070 
00072     Numeric operator* (const Point2&  p) const { return    x * p.x + y * p.y;     }
00073 
00076     bool operator==(const Point2&  p) const { return x == p.x && y == p.y;     }
00077 
00079     bool operator!=(const Point2&  p) const { return !(p == *this);            }
00080 
00083     bool operator<(const Point2& p) const { return x < p.x || (x == p.x && y < p.y); }
00084 
00086 
00087     double mod()  const { return sqrt(mod2());  }
00088 
00090     double mod2() const { return x * x + y * y; }
00091 
00093     double abs() const { return mod(); }
00094 
00096     double norm() const { return mod(); }
00097 
00099     double distTo2(const Point2& p) const { return ((*this) - p).mod2(); }
00100 
00102     double distTo(const Point2& p) const { return ((*this) - p).mod(); }
00103 
00105     double thetaWith(const Point2& p) const { return atan2(p.y - y, p.x - x); }
00106 
00108     Point2 perp() const { return Point2(y,-x); }
00109 
00111     Point2 vers() const { return vers(theta()); }
00112 
00115     double theta() const {
00116         return (x!=0||y!=0) ? atan2(y, x) : 0;
00117     }
00118 
00120     Point2 rot(double thetar, const Point2<Numeric>& center = Point2<Numeric>(0, 0)) const
00121     {
00122         double newx = (double) (this->x - center.x) * cos(thetar) - (this->y - center.y) * sin(thetar) + center.x;
00123         double newy = (double) (this->x - center.x) * sin(thetar) + (this->y - center.y) * cos(thetar) + center.y;
00124         return Point2((Numeric) newx, (Numeric) newy);
00125     }
00126 
00128     std::string toString () const
00129     {
00130         std::ostringstream oss;
00131         oss << "(" << x << "," << y << ")";
00132         return oss.str();
00133     }
00134 
00136     std::string outputSpaceSeparated() const {
00137         std::ostringstream oss;
00138         oss << " " << this->x << " " << this->y << " ";
00139         return oss.str();
00140     }
00141 
00143 
00145     static Point2 vers(double theta)  {
00146         return Point2(cos(theta), sin(theta));
00147     }
00148 
00150     static Point2 min(const Point2&a, const Point2&b)  {
00151         return Point2( std::min(a.x,b.x), std::min(a.y,b.y));
00152     }
00153 
00155     static Point2 max(const Point2&a, const Point2&b)  {
00156         return Point2( std::max(a.x,b.x), std::max(a.y,b.y));
00157     }
00158 
00159 }; // template Point2
00160 
00161 
00162 template <class Numeric>
00163 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream&os, const Point2<Numeric>&p) {
00164     return os << " " << p.x << " " << p.y << " ";
00165 }
00166 
00167 template <class Numeric>
00168 std::istream& operator>>( std::istream&is, Point2<Numeric>&p) {
00169     return is >> p.x >> p.y;
00170 }
00171 
00172 }} // ns
00173 
00174 #endif
